= Introduction =

Constants editor let's you modify the Constants.xml file which is located to TTB_DIR\Config\Constants.xml. You can reach the Constants Editor from Tray Icon -> Constants Editor.

= Content =

Constants.xml file contains every data that TibiaTek bot uses. You can find there very memory address, *but what's more important: you can find there options for the bot.* In case you want to use Fps Changer you can define the FPS for the changer. These are the default values for FPS changer:
{{{
FPSWhenActive: 10
FPSWhenInactive: 1
FPSWhenMinimized: 1
FPSWhenHidden: 1
}}}

As you see the names of the options are pretty self-explaining.

= How to Use =

Open Constants editor and you'll see two rows. One with names and another with values. Double click value to change it. *IMPORTANT:* If the value has digits, use them even you've entered the value which doesn't have digits (e.g use 2.0 instead of 2).
When the value is True or False that means On or Off. Don't put anything else to these lines.

*If you aren't 100% sure what you are doing take the backup of the Constants.xml first!*


= Constants and Explanations  =

 * LatestVersionUrl: http://www.tibiatek.com/version.php -- Location where TibiaTek bot checks if it's up to date
 * AutoPublishLocation: False -- Option for &sendloaction command. 
 * AutoPublishLocationInterval: 600000 -- Option for &sendloaction command
 * CreatureExpMultiplier: 1.0 -- Used in &exp creature on|off command. Change this when using bot with Private Server what has different exp rate
 * ShowInvisibleCreatures: True -- Show invisible creatures automatically
 * MusicalNotesOnAlarm: True -- When alarming show musical note animation top of you character
 * DebugOnLog: False -- Used in debugging
 * ClearLogOnStartup: True -- Used in debugging
 * LootWithCavebot: True -- Used in &cavebot command. You can determine if you want to l loot with cavebot. NOTE: You can definy it also from Cavebot window
 * CavebotLootMinCap: 0 -- Used in &cavebot command. Tells cavebot when it's time to stop looting. NOTE: You can definy it also from Cavebot window
 * CavebotAttackerRadius: 5.0 -- Used in &cavebot and &attacker commands. Determines the distance when cavebot/attacker attacks to the creature. You may want to change this if you are hunting in open area or narrow cave.
 * LootDelay: 500 -- Delay for looter. It loots one item in <LootDelay> time. The value is in milliseconds
 * LootInBag: True -- Determines if looter opens bag and loots it.
 * LootInBagDelay: 500 -- Delay for looting from bag. It loots one item in <LootInBagDelay> time. The value is in milliseconds
 * LootEatFromCorpse: True -- When you open corpse with auto looter, it determines if looter eats from the corpse too.
 * LootMaxDistance: 2.9 -- The max distance for the looter to go open the corpse. If you want it too loot just the tiles that are around you, use value 1.5
 * EatFromFloor: True -- Determines if auto eater eats from floor too.
 * EatFromFloorFirst: True --  Determines if auto looter eats first from floor, then from backpack
 * EatFromFloorMaxDistance: 1.5 -- Max distance for eating the food from floor.
 * AutoPickUpDelay: 2000 -- Delay where Pickuper pickups the item. Value is in milliseconds
 * HealersCheckInterval: 300 -- Delay for autohealer to check your heal. Value is in milliseconds
 * HealersAfterHealDelay: 300 -- Determines the delay after healing. Value is in milliseconds
 * HotkeysCanEquipItems: True -- Determines can you bind hotkeys to equip items
 * EquipItemsOnUse: True -- Determines can you equip items on use
 * AutoStackerDelay: 1000 -- Delay for auto stacker. It stacks one item in <AutoStackerDelay>. Value is in milliseconds
 * ModifyMOTD: True -- Use modified MOTD when connecting
 * SmartAttacker: True -- If enabled, auto attacker will attack to the closest enemy
 * FPSWhenActive: 10 -- Fps when Tibia Window is active
 * FPSWhenInactive: 1 -- Fps when Tibia Window is inactive
 * FPSWhenMinimized: 1 -- Fps when Tibia Window is minimized
 * FPSWhenHidden: 1 -- Fps when Tibia Window is hidden
 * FlashTaskbarWhenMessaged: False -- Flash taskbar when message (Public or Private) arrives.
 * FlashTaskbarWhenAlarmFires: True -- Flash taskbar when alarm fires.
 * StatsUploaderSaveOnDiskOnly: False -- Upload stats (use &statsuploader command) only to your disk. Use this if you don't have ftp acces to any server.
 * StatsUploaderUrl: ftp.server.com -- Url of the server
 * StatsUploaderPath: / -- Path where to upload the stats
 * StatsUploaderFilename: stats.xml -- Filename of the uploaded file
 * StatsUploaderUserID: userid -- User id for connecting to server
 * StatsUploaderPassword: password -- Password for connecting to server
 * StatsUploaderFrequency: 30000 -- Time in milliseconds when statsuploader uploads your  stats.
